document.title: Agriculture, Food, and Natural Resources Standards

244B08699FF44C60B2DA1ED48FFDF700.description:
Utilize green technologies and
sustainable practices that prevent or limit
negative environmental impacts.

B2EDF6EAA25A4209A110E5D1C7C98BD5.description:

of ecological factors incorporated into
landscape designs.

FB9F49025A7B4682A4152D7ECF041FEC.description:

ecology and summarize factors that
shape the ecology of a landscape (e.g., composition,

tools to create a desired design.

Demonstrate the use of tools
used for creating designs.

743F6B2054B44545B047EDCD1CDE9BCC.description:

used for design (e.g., computer landscape
software, drawing tools, florist tools, etc.).

B4F7BB28540044748DA2B10580142301.description:

5E9175BF9D714B539F27D3CF607B11D7.description:

2EF0054974024E3680C32D0F5D83682C.description:

plants in their environment (e.g., focal and

462B003ADD0D4A8DA8585819658C6027.description:
Identify and categorize plants
by their purpose (e.g., floral plants, landscape
plants, house plants, etc.).

764E938AF41D4DB3899447514B835E9D.description:
Apply principles of design in plant systems to enhance an environment
(e.g. floral, forest landscape, and farm).

F1D5431DA0304896A043D5A7A5BC7DD6.description:

grading, handling and packaging plants and

C7AA0F67C1284C1B8B822FEF04A386C1.description:

BE29F5F79C7B4DE199C4D48E5D7F6258.description:
Research laws and apply regulations
to ensure the production of plants and

and use.Â

3D28B3640F4B4FC0AA0AEADF2B2B1259.description:

used to maintain a safe product through

safety is ensured at each stage of the following

and local/regional food production
